inn1.comm: It's almost houseful there. Crowd have come out in full force. Tip and run to start the proceedings. Gambhir tapped a full delivery close on the off side and off they go for the first single of the game.
134 kmph length delivery, holding its line outside off, left alone
Sehwag is providing the atmosphere here. What a start. What a shot. Full in length and outside off stump and he lifted it over extra cover. Thwack.
on the middle,  Sehwag ends up chipping it to the on side ... the ball is in the air but drops in between midwicket and mid-on.
137 kmph delivery whizzes past the attempted dab to third man and to the keeper
walks down the track but mistimes the punchy drive to the off side. One over gone and we have already seen a six from Sehwag. The crowd are roaring. Tremendous buzz out there.
135 kmph delivery but drifting down the leg side and the keeper dives but deflects it to fine leg. There was some movement there. It started from the stumps before jagging down leg
loud shout for lbw but t'was a tad too high. Good delivery, though. It pitched around the leg stump line and straightened to rap the pad. Gambhir was beaten by the straightening..
tries to work it to the on side but ends up jabbing it to his pad
length delivery on the off stump, Gambhir tries to punch on the up but edges it to backward square leg.
moves in the air and towards the off stump, Sehwag pushes it back to the bowler. That was a good delivery and got the respect from the batsman

even better delivery. A jaffa. It moved in the air and cut in sharply from outside off, Sehwag shaped to drive but the ball rushed through the bat and pad gap and over the stumps. Peter McGlashan pulls of a fine acrobatic save
good over from O'Brien. This one was in the corridor outside off stump, left alone
137 kmph short of length delivery kicking up off this hard pitch and Gambhir hops to stab it down
angling away from Gautam who thinks about dabbing it but resists the urge at the last minute
139 kmph full length delivery on off and middle, driven towards mid-on.
he is beaten. Good length delivery cutting away, Gambhir has a flirt but can't connect.
drifts to the pads, clipped away past square leg for a single where it's picked up by Jesse Ryder
swing and a miss. Gambhir charged down the wicket and lashed at it but couldn't connect and the ball flies past the off stump.
short in length, cutting into the rib cage, tucked behind square for a single
superb delivery and a lbw shout. It moved in sharply in the air, late, and cut in sharply as well, cramping up Sehwag and thudding into the pad. Going down leg, though. But they give away overthrows
well outside the off stump
around 137 k and outside off, Sehwag lets it go past him
flashed to third man boundary. It kicked up from short of length outside off, Sehwag went for the aerial cut over backward point and it flies off the outer edge to third man
fuller, straighter and Sehwag flicked it away to deep square leg region for two runs
hands the strike back to Sehwag with a little dab to third man
138 k leg cutter outside off stump, left alone

Wow! says Martin Crowe on air and Wow it is. It was almost a short of length delivery, not even overpitched, but Sehwag clouts it on the up and over extra cover. Stunning hit. "The man is a freak!" screams Crowe. What a bundle of explosive talent.
cuts in towards the pad and they pick up a leg bye
Mills strikes and New Zealand get into a celebratory huddle. It was cutting away from Gambhir who poked it to the keeper. One down.
full in length, drawing Raina forward and he obliges with an intended cover drive but edges it to the on side
slips down the leg side to the left-handed Raina
straighter, Raina tries to play it to the on side but ends up pushing it down the track
138 k, short in length and straightening but just down the leg side, though. Two wides already in the over.
And again. Further down leg. O'Brien sports a sheepish looking smile. The crowd, majority of Indians, scream in joy.
length delivery on the off and middle and Raina defends down the track
lifting delivery, chest-high, on the middle, Raina gets on the back foot to defend to the off side
short-pitched delivery at the throat and Raina hops to keep it down on the off side.
what a peachy delivery. It moved across Raina who was squared up a bit but to his credit he didn't hang his bat out
again he slips down leg, on the thigh pad and it rolls away past the diving keeper and neither can Oram get around in time
136 k full length delivery on the off stump and Sehwag opens the bat face to guide it to backward point
Mills gets the blogger's block. Slips this one down leg side.
hmm it was tapped towards mid-on, they hesitated but ended up jogging across.
superb delivery, in the zone outside off stump, Raina pushes the bat inside the line and is beaten
gets forward this time to defend to the off side
short in length and Raina punches it to right of covers where Guptil makes a diving stop. Martin Crowe feels the pitch is holding up a bit. Raina had checked that shot of his there.
goes for the off drive, a tad too early into the shot , ball must have stopped on him a bit , and the bat-handle rotates as he tries to adjust and the ball rolls towards mid-on
139 kmph but wrong line sir. Full and on the legs and Raina picks it over square leg. No sweat. Four easy runs.
again on the pads, nurdled to fine leg.
Shot! screams couple of banners in the arena as Sehwag swivels off the front foot to play a cracking pull shot way in front of square leg.

Six over deep backward point. Mad Gaiety indeed. Overpitched and well outside off and Sehwag slices it as only he can and the ball flies to the fielder who jumps, arches back but can only topple it over the boundary.
All hell has broken loose. Another full pitched delivery outside off and Sehwag creams it high over wide mid-off region. The bat completes an arc and the ball crashes into the boundary

DRopped by Ross Taylor at first slip. Length delivery outside off and Sehwag goes for the on-the-up whack and edges it. It flies very fast and Taylor hops, gets both hands to it but the ball bursts through
flicks past square leg for a single
leans forward to defend down the track
Dropped again ?B?y McCullum this time. He should have got this one. Raina hopped to punch a short-of-length delivery to backward point where McCullum jumped but couldn't hold on. What a clanger.
leans forward to defend to the off side
Raina goes for the big swing over the on side but ends up dragging it off the inner edge to long leg
short in length, on the middle and Sehwag hops to get on top of the bounce and importantly, to allow him to get his wrists going to whip it to the on side for a single.
length delivery on the stumps, pushed back
short in length, punched through the off side
full pitched around the off stump, Raina times it sweetly to mid-off

Scott Styris you beauty! There was lot of confusion initially about who is going to take it but Styris does it in the end. Raina went for a big swing, but got under the ball too much and the ball ballooned towards mid-on. Styris  ran in from midwicket - the mid-on was sent back earlier - his captain was at mid-off. Yours or mine? It looked both were going to stand and watch but Styris moved in the end and dived to hold a tumbling catch. Two down. Wickets and runs. Where is Bill Lawry I say.
it's a delivery on the off stump but Sehwag shuffles across to whip it past square leg
short of length, defended to cover
pitched up a bit, on the stumps, and defended with open face
back of a length, no room, defended towards cover
short in length, just outside off stump, dabbed to third man
full length delivery just outside off stump, Rohit leans forward to defend to the off side.
stretches across to push to covers. There must be immense pressure on Rohit to get a single and get off strike.
he does it this time with a little nudge to the on side and the crowd are happy. Their man Viru is on strike.
Sehwag stands well inside the crease, has a swing a short-of-length delivery straightening outside off but can't connect

The Big cat has departed. Oram has struck. Oram saw Sehwag charging out like a speeding truck and quickly shortened the length. Sehwag tried to adjust by going for a pull shot but ended up top edging it high to point region where McCullum takes it. Entertainment over. Or does it? Yuvraj steps out.
short in length, just outside off, cutting in a bit, Rohit mistimes a drive to the on side
on a length, outside off stump and Yuvraj covers his off stump and shoulders arms
fuller, straighter, on the middle, Yuvraj shapes to defend to the on side and gets a leading edge to off.
leans well forward to defend to covers
length delivery well outside off, Yuvraj lets Peter McGlashan collect it
short in length outside off, Yuvraj punched it on the up and the ball sped away past mid-off.
in the zone outside off, Yuvraj shapes to play before withdrawing his bat in a hurry
leans forward to stab a length delivery to the off side
short in length, outside off stump, guided to backward point.
overpitched on the off stump line, caressed straight down the track, timed it well but hits the stumps on the other end
cuts in to beat the defensive poke and hits high on the pad. Bit of inside edge as well. Good sharp delivery that.
short in length but some width offered and Rohit crashes it past backward point and to wide third man
leans forward to defend to the off side
leans forward to turn a full length delivery to the on side
short in length, on the middle and leg, clipped to deep square leg
on a length, around off stump, Yuvraj plays a very compact looking defensive stroke
fuller and outside off, Yuvraj gets into a position to drive but lets it go through to the keeper
length delivery on the middle, turned behind square leg for a single
fullish, on the middle and leg, should have been put away but Rohit can only flick it to midwicket.
on the middle and off stump line, defended down the pitch
on the legs, tucked to fine leg region for couple of runs
leans forward to defend to midwicket
wide down the leg side. India 79 for 3
on the middle and leg, bouncing a bit, turned to fine leg
beaten outside off stump as Rohit tries to work it down to third man
full in length, on the middle, Rohit's front leg is again a tad too much across and he gets his bat around it to push the ball to the on side of the pitch
on the middle and leg line, Yuvraj stays back, crouches to work it past square leg
cuts in from outside off, Rohit edges it on to his pad and the ball rolls away to the off side and they rush across for a quick single
full and outside off, angling away, left alone
short in length, Yuvraj defends it down the pitch. Good going this from Ryder.
hurls it fuller and Yuvraj drives sweetly and Vettori makes a fine diving half-stop to his left at mid-off
on the middle and leg, leans over to work it past square leg
almost edged it to his stumps. Again late on the defensive shot, doesn't cover the line of the ball cutting back in and edges it
short in length, on the middle and leg, wristed behind square leg
leans forward to push-drive to mid-off
leans forward to defend another length delivery
cutting in towards the middle, jabbed to the on side
shorter and Rohit pulls to deep midwicket for a single. He didn't time that one well..
leans forward to rotate the strike with a dab to left of backward point where McCullum makes a acrobatic save and fires in a throw at the striker's end
gets forward to defend to the off side
full in length, angled across Yuvraj who mistimes the off drive
full in length again and driven crisply but straight to mid-off
The Black Caps are rocking here. Ryder slips in a full length delivery, just like the previous two, and Yuvraj went for his square drive but ended up edging it behind.
short in length, cutting in, defended to the off side
stays back to punch to right of mid-off where Taylor makes the stop
from round the wicket, a quick and flat delivery on the middle, pushed down to long-on
floated in on the middle, tapped towards square leg for a single
another quick one, 94 k, on the off and middle, defended to the off side. So far he has bowled quick to Rohit and slow to Dhoni.
another one skidding on quickly, dabbed to point
slows this one and flights it as well and Rohit is down the track, moves towards off and lofts the ball over wide long-on for a fine hit.
full pitched on the middle and leg and Dhoni whips it straight to midwicket. He will feel he has missed out an run-scoring opportunity there
goes back, tries to punch through the off side but ends up edging it
good nagging delivery on the middle and off line, from the good length, eased to covers
skips down the track and wrists a full length delivery to mid-on
on a length and just outside off, left alone
down the track and eases it gently to deep cover region
cuts in from outside off, Dhoni was on the shuffle, tries to dab it to the on side but stumbles a bit and is hit high on the inner thigh
length delivery outside off stump and Rohit gets forward to dead-bat it
short in length, just outside off, pushed towards mid-off
length delivery outside off, Rohit moves across and punches it straight to covers
comes down the track, goes for the big heave but edges the short-of-lengh delivery towards left of mid-on for a single
gets back and across to push through cover point for a single and will retain the strike
drags this one shorter than normal and Dhoni gets back and across to force it through cover point
couple of steps down the track and drives to mid-off
full and in the zone outside off, Dhoni shuffles across and lets the ball go through to the keeper
nice tight line continues. Dhoni gets forward to defend it back to the bowler
132 kmph off a gentle short run-up, cutting into Dhoni who was down the track and is hit on the pad
walks down the track and Ryder keeps it on the off stump, pushed back to him.
short in length and outside off, steered to right of third man, Rohit slips as he reaches the other end

moves towards off stump, Oram gets it cut from outside off and Dhoni pushes it down the track. He has been repeatedly trying to take a step forward and across towards off to work the ball to the on side but both Ryder and Oram have been spot on with their line. Good contest on.
stays adjacent to the line this time and pushes it through cover point
on the middle and off, turned through vacant midwicket for couple of runs.
a tad slower, outside off, cuts it to the ground and past the diving first slip who deflects it to third man.
again that movement - down the wicket and towards off stump - but again the line is perfect - on the off- pushed towards mid-on
stays right back to a length delivery on the off, pushed to covers

And Jesse Ryder has got rid of the Indian captain. As he has done through this little knock, Dhoni moved down the wicket and towards off stump. As he has done all through, Ryder kept his calm and got the ball to cut in from outside off. Dhoni went for the on-the-up push-drive but got a thick inside edge. Good persistent bowling gets the result.
slips down the leg side .. Rudi extends his arms
pretty full in length, pushed back to the bowler
leans forward to defend a length delivery shaping into middle and off
fuller, on the middle, worked to square leg

Ryder's day out. "I am a fan" say the banners from the Kiwis. Another delivery cutting into the batsman and Yusuf plays all around it and gets a fatal inside edge.. Timber! This is super stuff from Ryder and NZ.
length delivery cutting in, punched to mid-off
defended on the front foot
on the leg and middle, Rohit gets his bat around the front pad and manages to get bat to ball
lunges out to defend a short-of-length delivery to midwicket
in the zone outside off, this one straightens and Harbhajan picks the variation and shoulders arms
similar delivery and again left alone
gets back to defend to the on side
overpitched outside off ,wristed to mid-on
again gets his bat in front of the left leg that has been pressed dangerously too far across and gets a tickle through midwicket
on the off stump line, squeezed to the off side
lunges out to stab a length delivery and it squirts away off the outer edge to third man
leans forward to ease a full delivery to left of mid-off for a single
cutting into the off stump, pushed to the off side
steps down the track, Oram slows up the pace and shortens the length, and a surprised Rohit tries to slog it away but ends up mistiming it towards mid-on

Vettori pulls off a smart piece of fielding, nothing smart about the Indians' running. It was driven well to the right of mid-off where Vettori ran to a make a fine diving stop. Harbhajan started to run initially but didn't want it on second thoughts but Rohit kept going across like a run-away train. THe throw comes to non-striker's end and Harbhajan gave himself up.
leans forward to push to the off side
short of length, cutting in , defended to the off side
outside off stump, defended on the front foot to covers
full in length, driven to covers
134 k, length delivery cutting in from just outside off, pushed to the off side
full in length, eased down to long-on
fuller, outside off stump, Zaheer was late in picking up the length, lunged out but ended up timing what looked a mere jab and the ball races towards the cover boundary. Elliot pulls it back in time
short in length, straightening outside off, run down to third man
on a length, just outside off, defended on the front foot
overpitched outside off stump, driven to sweeper cover
cutting in from outside off, Zaheer goes back and across to defend
short and outside off, flashed to third man
cutting in towards middle, edged to the on side
beaten by a beauty. It held its line outside off and Rohit was squared up completely and was lucky not to get the edge
on the pads, tucked away to long leg
Rohit goes down town. Fine attacking shot. He thrust his front foot out and lofted a full delivery over mid-off
fuller, short of the blockhole, pushed down the pitch
length delivery this time and Rohit drives, bat away from the body, and edges the ball to the on side
slower but overpitched, driven down to long-off
gets forward to defend to mid-off
half-volley outside off and Zaheer crashes it but straight to sweeper cover
quickish delivery, turning from the middle, defended to the off side

Another run out. Another messy running. It was dabbed to short third man, Zaheer didn't want a run, Rohit wanted - it was the non-striker's call - and Zaheer responded late. Very late. Gone. Stranded. NZ fans are smiling at last.
another quick delivery, pushed to covers

102 km per hour, skidding quickly towards middle and off, pushed to the off side, they think about a run, Vettori picks and fires in a direct hit at the non-striker's end. The ball ricochets to allow India to pick up an overthrow
rolls to short fine leg region
he is really firing it in to Rohit. Another full and on the middle, turned to the on side
worked behind square leg
banged in short and it cuts in , PK takes his eyes off the ball, and allows it to hit his left shoulder as he hops.
140 k short of length delivery on the middle, nudged to the on side
137 k short in length, moving in towards middle, pushed down the wicket
another short delivery, pulled weakly to the on side
another hop and he gets the ball down to the on side. Good tight interesting over.
another quick and flat, Rohit is down the track but can't do much with it, squeezed to point
99k , flat trajectory, skidding on to the middle, worked to midwicket
moves outside leg, Vettori keeps it on a length at middle and Rohit lofts it towards long-on. Good for him that he didn't connect well; he would have holed up to the fielder
fine punch off the back foot. He stood tall to punch a short-of-length delivery through extra cover. High-quality stroke there and Stephen Fleming is impressed.
floated down leg side, tries to flick but can't connect properly
full pitched outside off, pushed through covers for a single
almost caught and bowled. It was dug in short, PK couldn't get out of the way, ended up fending it uppishly to the off side and O'Brien rushed forward but couldn't reach
moves outside leg and short-arm pulls it over square leg. Didn't time it well, though.

The short treatment has worked for O'Brien. Kumar went for another pull but ends up ballooning it high towards first slip and the keeper says he will take it and does so. And then they were one. What a evening for the hosts.
short and rising, left alone
fuller and run through point for a single
overpitched on the middle,  pushed down to long-on
full and on the middle, 94 k, turned behind square leg for a single
almost in the blockhole, dug out towards the on side
92 k, full on the off, driven towards mid-off, they charge across for a single, Peter McGlashan shouts for the throw to come to him, the throw goes to non-striker's end
couple of steps down the track and Vettori yorks him, dug out to the on side
99 k outside off, guided through point region
outside off stump, run down to third man for a single. Ishant on strike now. Expect a bumper barrage
no he decides to gift a half volley and Ishant is eager to rip it open but drives straight to covers
All out 149. O'Brien slips in a slower one and Ishant is early into the drive and edges straight to first slip.

inn2.comm: swings in towards the middle and Ryder does well to hold his balance to defend to the on side
fuller, straighter, shaping away from middle, Ryder gets a leading edge, trying to push it to the on side
Lovely wristy swat-flick from Jesse. It was full and on the leg side, he waited for it before putting it away in style
short of length, on the middle, worked to long leg for a single
tapped close towards extra cover and gets off the mark with a quick single
leans across to punch on the up and through extra cover
full in length, on the middle stump line, edged to the pad .. loud shout for lbw from behind the wicket but Zaheer doesn't appeal
fuller, on the middle, squeezed to mid-off
lands on a length on middle and leg, moves towards middle, McCullum gets behind the line to defend down the track
similar delivery, pushed towards short mid-off, they think about a single, Raina charges out from covers and fires in a throw at non-striker's end
moving away from McCullum who guides to third man
comes forward to defend a full length ball back to Zaheer
on the middle and off line, pushed towards mid-off

Oh boy what has McCullum done. He charged down the wicket, moving outside leg and went for a big heave but missed it completely. Praveen remains as cool as ever. No emotion shown as he sees the bails fly. ah no he does. I missed that. He lets out a shout with a pumped fist.
lands on a length around off stump and curves away sharply, left alone
on the off stump line, squeezed to backward point region
turned past square leg
on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot to the on side
full pitched outside off, eased to mid-off
139 k, lands on a good length outside off and stays there, left alone
slightly short in length, Ryder goes for the pull and ends up fetching it from outside off and mistiming it to mid-on
overpitched outside off, driven well but can't beat mid-off
good delivery, homing in on the off stump, straightening a bit, Ryder pushed it to the off side
shapes in towards off and Ryder gets a tiny step forward and nudged the ball to the off side
length delivery just outside off stump, guided to point
outswinger around the off stump, Guptill went for the big cover drive but was beaten by the swing
leans forward, taps the ball close on the off side, looks up at Ryder who responds quickly and they complete the run without any alarms
on the off stump line, defended to covers
on a length, on the middle, pushed to the on side of the pitch, PK stops and threatens that he will throw it at the striker's end. Ryder is cool, doesn't even look at the bowler
And finishes the over in style. A short but firm step forward and he swung through the line, nice and easy, and the ball sped away through extra cover
on a length around middle stump line, defended on the front foot
fuller, drawing Guptil forward into a defensive poke and it runs off the outer edge to backward point
hits the bat hard with the "heavy ball" and Guptil steers to backward point
on the off stump line, squeezed off the inner edge to long leg
cutting into Ryder who deflects it to midwicket
length delivery, drifting into middle and leg, nudged past square leg
leans forward to defend to the off side
Wow! That was a delicious whack. It was a length delivery but Ryder thumped it on the up and over long-on.
Praveen switches to round the stumps and curves the ball in towards off and middle, defended to the off side
on the middle and leg, Ryder uses the round-the-stumps angle to wrist it to Ishant at long leg
short in length, punched off the back foot to mid-off. He stood tall and played that shot really well. Easy on the eye. Pity about not finding the gap
fuller, on the middle and off, driven to mid-off
drifting towards the pad, turned past square leg and he comes back for the second run
on that off stump , pushed towards the gap at extra cover for a single
just over midwicket fielder. It was full, it was on the middle and leg and Guptill picked it over the on-side; he wanted a higher clearance but it shot over the jumping jack at midwicket.
shifts his line to off and its driven to point region
Biff. Wham. Full pitched just outside off and Guptill swung it over mid-off. No problem in clearing this one. He held his balance well as he played that shot.
driven along the ground this time and will pick up a single to wide mid-off region
starts off with a short-of-length delivery outside off, Guptil goes for the cut, bottom edges it one bounce to left of Dhoni
he goes for another cut shot but this time the ball doesn't bounce as much as he anticipated and missed it completely
stands up tall to push towards mid-on for a single
Classy short-arm wristy pull.  It was slightly short in length, trying to cramp him but he manages to get it over the infield.

Absolutely fabulicious.. It was shorter in length than the previous one and that allowed Ryder to free his arms .. a lusty pull from outside off to wide midwicket region. The previous one was a tougher shot to play but this one was more exciting for the viewers to watch
from round the stumps now, spears it in full and hits the pad
Guptill goes downtown to buy a boundary. He thrust his front foot out and despite it being a length delivery, he swung through the line and got it over mid-on.
back over the stumps and fires in a bouncer, which has been signalled a wide. Guptill went for the hook but couldn't reach

full in length  and that has been crashed through extra cover. It flew away perfectly in the gap. When he finished that shot, he looked like Chris Cairns. Standing up tall and punching on the up. I am not comparing the two, just making a observation on this shot in particular.
pushed through the off side for a single
full and on the off and middle. What does Jesse do? He works his wrists overtime and laps it through the on side.
yorker on the leg and middle, dug out to midwicket
full in length and outside off, carved through the vacant slip region for yet another boundary.
short in length and there is that wristy swat-pull again from Ryder, a single to long leg.
cutting in with bounce, tapped to the on side and after some hesitation, they scamper across
short in length, outside off stump, punched to covers
on a length, around the middle stump line, defended to the on side of the pitch

Flamboyant whack over midwicket. He made it look so good. It was short delivery and Ryder has crashed it over midwicket in some style. Ishant has a few words to say at Ryder who just shrugs his shoulder. Praveen steps in to cool and puts his hand up to Ryder, his team-mate this year in IPL, to sort of say forget Ishant's histrionics.  Ishant is still steaming as he walks off. Don't know what the fuss was about. Don't know who started it. That was furious frivolity
leans forward to defend
short of length, turned to the on side
bangs it short, a bouncer outside off stump, Ryder shaped to pull but wisely decides against dragging it outside off
short again, closer to Ryder who pulls this one for a single
fuller in length and Guptill lashes it off the outer edge high in the air and couple of bounces down to the sub Karthik at third man
full in length or so I thought but Ryder doesn't . He crouches to play his short-arm-jab over midwicket but that length didn't allow him to get under the ball and find his timing..
short in length, outside off, punched sweetly to backward point. That was traveling.

Oh boy this is fun. Ryder on the storm. Ishant v Ryder and we have a clear winner. Ishant bangs it in short and Ryder muscles it high over deep midwicket. That one disappeared into the stands. No words exchanged this time.
dropped by Yuvraj at backward point. It was short in length and cracked hard but straight to Yuvraj, who spills a waist-high catch
leans forward to push a length delivery to covers
fuller, 142 k, on the off stump, driven to covers
on the middle stump line, pushed to mid-on
length delivery on the stumps, stabbed off the inner edge to short fine leg
holds his balance well to push a length delivery to mid-off
Zak fires in a bouncer and Jesse swivels around to pull. He is late on the shot but find a nice profitable top edge to fine-leg boundary
another short-pitched delivery, this time Ryder is ready, alert and pulls it well to the ground but Harbhajan makes a sliding stop moving to his right at deep square leg
short in length, just outside off, guided to backward point
138 kmph, short in length, at the rib cage, defended to the on side. End of another entertaining over.
Whoa! What a stunning thumping on-the-up drive. It was short in length outside off and he just creamed that. "He is in the zone," coos Martin Crowe. You bet he is. Gem of a knock.
length delivery outside off, pushed to the off side
fuller, just outside off, not much room nor length but Ryder creates his own by bending his knee and working his wrists to punch it through backward point
full and straight, pushed to covers, Ryder wants to come on strike and Guptill had to really yell out NO
places this one to cover point and gets a single.

Ishant gets his man with little bit of help from Ryder himself. It was a short of length delivery angling away from Ryder who tried to punch it through extra cover but edged it back to his stumps. He is very disappointed, swings his bat in the air over the stumps and shakes his head as he walks off. Ishant doesn't celebrate much. A very fine entertaining knock comes to an end.
that has been flayed away. Short in length and angled outside off stump, Guptill reaches out to carve it over backward point.
backs to the leg side, Zaheer fires it on the leg stump, pushed to the off side
Lord Guptill. Imperious. He backed away a bit, stood tall to knife a short-of-length delivery on the middle over wide mid-off. He held the pose for a short while, enjoying his shot. It was that good.
Zaheer goes round the stumps and the ball bends around the corner over long leg boundary. It was full and on the legs, Guptill picks it up and over the boundary. Supreme piece of timing
beaten by a full delivery angling away as  he lunges out to push to the off side
flighted slow through the air, on the middle and leg, turned to deep backward square leg
leans forward to defend to midwicket
on the middle and leg, shuffles across, leans over to defend to the on side
edged but flies between Dhoni and the slip. It skidded on straight, after landing on a length outside off, Taylor was clueless, hung his bat out and it flew to the left of the lunging Rohit at slip
worked through the on side for a single
shuffles into the line of a length delivery to defend to the off side
short in length, bit of width on offer and Ross Taylor lashes it through left of backward point for a fine boundary
fuller, just outside off stump, worked to midwicket
shuffles across to punch to covers
this one cuts back in, Taylor gets low to push it to the on side
136 kmph, on a length, on the middle, turned to the on side
flighted just outside off, defended on the front foot
steps down the track and drives back, along the ground, to Harbhajan who makes a half-stop and has hurt his hand in the process.
flighted on the middle, defended on the front foot
slower through the air, outside off, edged the sweep to short fine-leg where Yuvraj makes a mess of it to give away a single
shuffles towards off, leg stump is exposed, turned past square leg.
flatter, quicker, goes for the sweep again, misses and is struck on the pad outside off. Dhoni shouts, Harbhajan joins in and Rudi negates the appeal. Rightly so.
short in length, kicking up outside off, pushed to the off side
fuller, just outside off, that shuffle has taken him to off stump and he defends
the bouncer arrives and Taylor goes down under
full in length, on the middle and off line, holding up a touch, Taylor adjusts to that, twists his body to get in line and defends with the full face of the bat
cutting in from outside off, defended towards covers
leans forward to drive a full delivery to covers
couple of steps down the track, harbhajan keeps it slow and retains the higher trajectory, defended
pushed through the on side
shuffles towards off and defends to the on side of the pitch
this time drives back to the bowler
full and outside off stump, Taylor leans forward to defend
pushes it off the front of his hand, full and sliding in, driven down to long-on
very nice. It was full in length and Taylor uses the bottom hand to power the lofted drive and whips it over wide midwicket
he has killed this one. He shuffles to the off stump and swings the full length delivery over cow corner. Ala Dean Jones. Bloody Marvellous.
drags back the length and shifts the line to outside off, steered to backward point
fuller, driven to mid-off
That bottom hand is working overtime. It was on the middle, may be middle and leg, but Taylor's shuffle meant it was easy pickings for him. And he whipped it to midwicket boundary.
gets forward and across to defend to the off side
leans forward to ping long-off for a single
on the off stump line, hit back to the bowler
shuffles across, Harbhajan keeps it outside off, steered to backward point
on the middle, driven down to long-on
comes down the track, doesn't reach the pitch of the delivery, so quietly tucks it into a gap at the off side for a single
on the middle and leg, worked past square leg for couple of runs.
Guptill take a bow. Bloody entertaining way to bring up your fifty. He moved his front foot out and biffed the full length delivery over wide long-on. The white ball kept sailing into the night sky.

Majestic pull to bring up the win. It was the bouncer and Martin Guptill stood up tall to unfurl a spanking pull. New Zealand have won the game and by doing that, have made everybody look forward to the Test series.
